results.title: Metformin plus proton pump inhibitors therapy: the cobalamin deficiency challenge.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: We present the case of a 65 year-old white man with an history of @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Renal_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D002292 @@@renal cell carcinoma@@@, @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hodgkin_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006689 @@@hepatic nodular sclerosis Hodgkin's lymphoma@@@, who was under treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ because of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and with @CHEMICAL_Pantoprazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077402 @@@pantoprazole@@@ because of @DISEASE_Barrett_Esophagus @DISEASE_MESH:D001471 @@@Barrett's esophagus@@@.

citations.NLM: Purchiaroni F, Galli G, Annibale B. Metformin plus proton pump inhibitors therapy: the cobalamin deficiency challenge. Eur Rev Med Pharmacol Sci. 2015 Jul;19(13):2501-2. PMID: 26214788
